title: What do you play when you play the piano? - Quora

response.answer_text: The introduction to Canon in DMost of the right hand for “You Belong with Me” by Taylor SwiftEverything but the bridge and vocal line (or just the vocal line) for “All of Me” by John LegendSome beginning chords and the vocal melody for “Move Along” by All American Rejects, sometimes playing the same thing on both handsRecently some of the main “verses” of “Bohemian Rhapsody” by Queen (trying to think how to at least add single chords on left hand too)A fair amount of the right hand for “How to Save a Life” by The Fray, but two-handed introSometimes random stuff newly if I happen to have accidentally played the right bit for some new songOther stuff I may not be remembering right nowMost of this was merely to have fun. Canon was actually a more deliberate effort to force my left hand into actually playing stuff and having to go dominating the rhythm (I STILL need to pay attention closely to how my left hand is going when playing it, it’s easy for me to mess up).
Anything and everything I can get my hands on! I love to play rags by Scott Joplin, and I find it so fun to learn how to play theme songs for movies or TV shows!
